description.en:
The dark days of one's life, the meeting that will become their light is waiting!  
  
A man who has no regrets about his life, Hyung-Jong and a woman who is excited about her new life.  
  
One Wednesday, while walking down their own paths, the two meet each other like it's their fate.  
  
What will happen to them? Let their lives meet on Wednesday.

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Rabu-yang-Indah/2422)

description.id:
Hyeong Jong yang merasa tidak memiliki tujuan hidup, memutuskan untuk mengakhiri hidupnya dengan melakukan Eunthanasia, namun sebelum melakukan hal itu, ia harus melakukan konsultasi selama 3 bulan dengan Seo Hyeon Ju, seorang psikolog baru, akankah Hyeon Jong menemukan alasan untuk melanjutkan hidupnya?

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Rabu-yang-Indah/2422)

description.ko:
인생의 암흑기, 당신의 빛이 되어줄 만남이 기다리고 있습니다! 
‘삶’에 미련이 없는 남자, 형종과 새로운 ‘삶’에 들뜬 여자 연주. 
정반대의 길을 걷던 두 사람이 어느 수요일, 운명처럼 만났습니다. 
과연 그들에겐 어떤 일이 벌어질까요? 
수요일에 만나는 그들의 ‘삶’, 함께 만나봐요~♥

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Rabu-yang-Indah/2422)
